sqlMap.select: /* BizSearchSQL.getWishCount */ SELECT NVL ((SELECT COUNT (1) FROM TB_WISH_PRODUCT B WHERE B.WISH_GBN = 'P' AND B.SELL_PRDT_BCODE = A.SELL_PRDT_BCODE AND B.MALL_ID = '02' AND B.USER_NUM = #userNum# ),0) wishUserCount , A.NYO_SELL_BAN_YN nyoSellBanYn FROM TB_SELL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TB_RECORD C on A.RCRD_CD = C.RCRD_CD WHERE A.SELL_PRDT_BCODE = #sellPrdtBcode#
